amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-7 to ensure that law enforcement can only take action against unlawful speech.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Bishop (NC).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
